participant_1.background:
I treasure my collection of vintage horror movies, which I love to watch with my grandchildren.
i love to go outside at night and eavesdrop on my neighbors arguments.
i like fitness.
I love adrenaline rushes and pushing myself to the limit.
i moved to ny to study in a prestigious designing school.

participant_2.background:
I live in the US and work out in my home gym every day to stay fit
i am a dog walker.
i am in the army.
my grand children mean the world to me.
I have never been arrested, and I am proud of my clean record.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing great! I just moved to NY to study at a prestigious designing school.
That sounds exciting! I'm in the US and work out in my home gym every day to stay fit.
That's awesome! I love to stay fit too. I love adrenaline rushes and pushing myself to the limit.
Me too! I love to go hiking and camping. I'm also a dog walker, so I get to spend a lot of time outdoors with my fur babies.
That sounds amazing! I love dogs, but I don't have one of my own. I do love watching horror movies though!
I love horror movies too! I have a huge collection of vintage horror movies that I love to watch with my grandchildren.
That's so cool! I've never been to the army, but I've always been curious about it.
It's an amazing experience! I'm proud to serve my country.
I'm sure it is. I'm glad you're enjoying it.
Thanks! I'm glad you're enjoying NY!
Me too! It's such a great city.
I'm sure you'll have a great time here.
Thanks! I'm excited to see what the future holds!
I'm sure it will be great!
